languages.text: "Танакия — лучший специалист Лорд-инквизитора по шпионажу! Там, где Ксавьер воздерживался от публичной демонстрации сил, Калбергария была незаменима! Почему?!"
"Tanakia is the Lord Inquisitor's top espionage specialist! Wherever Xavier chose to refrain from making a public show of strength, Calbergaria was invaluable! Why would he do this?"
languages.original_text: "Танакия — лучший специалист Лорд-инквизитора по шпионажу! Там, где Ксавьер воздерживался от публичной демонстрации сил, Калбергария была незаменима! Почему?!"

traits.locale_text: "Tanakia is the Lord Inquisitor's top espionage specialist! Wherever Xavier chose to refrain from making a public show of strength, Calbergaria was invaluable! Why would he do this?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Tanakia is the Lord Inquisitor's top espionage specialist! Wherever Xavier chose to refrain from making a public show of strength, Calbergaria was invaluable! Why would he do this?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Tanakia is the Lord Inquisitor's top espionage specialist! Wherever Xavier chose to refrain from making a public show of strength, Calbergaria was invaluable! Why would he do this?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “可塔娜基娅是大审判官手下的渗透专家！无论希维尔打算在什么地方做些动作，而又不打算引起公众关注，塔娜基娅都会是不可多得的人才！他为什么要这么做？”
languages.original_text: "Tanakia is the Lord Inquisitor's top espionage specialist! Wherever Xavier chose to refrain from making a public show of strength, Calbergaria was invaluable! Why would he do this?"

traits.locale_text: “可塔娜基娅是审判长手下的渗透专家！无论希维尔打算在什么地方做些动作，而又不打算引起公众关注，塔娜基娅都会是不可多得的人才！他为什么要这么做？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «¡Tanakia es la mejor especialista de espionaje del Lord Inquisidor! ¡Cada vez que Xavier no quería hacer gala de su poder en público, Calbergaria demostraba su inmensa valía! ¿Por qué haría algo así?».
languages.original_text: "Tanakia is the Lord Inquisitor's top espionage specialist! Wherever Xavier chose to refrain from making a public show of strength, Calbergaria was invaluable! Why would he do this?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Tanakia es la mejor especialista de espionaje del Lord Inquisidor! ¡Cada vez que Xavier no quería hacer gala de su poder en público, Calbergaria demostraba su inmensa valía! ¿Por qué haría algo así?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「タナキアはロード・インクィジターの最高のスパイ活動の専門家だ！ザビエルが公の場で力を示すことを控えると決めたのがどこであれ、カルベルガリアは非常に貴重だった！どうして彼がそんなことを？」
languages.original_text: "Tanakia is the Lord Inquisitor's top espionage specialist! Wherever Xavier chose to refrain from making a public show of strength, Calbergaria was invaluable! Why would he do this?"

traits.locale_text: 「タナキアはロード・インクィジターの最高のスパイ活動の専門家だ！ザビエルが公の場で力を示すことを控えると決めたのがどこであれ、カルベルガリアは非常に貴重だった！どうして彼がそんなことを？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Tanakia est la meilleure spécialiste en espionnage du seigneur inquisiteur ! Partout où Xavier se refusait de faire une démonstration de force en public, Calbergaria lui était extrêmement utile ! Pourquoi ferait-il une chose pareille ? »
languages.original_text: "Tanakia is the Lord Inquisitor's top espionage specialist! Wherever Xavier chose to refrain from making a public show of strength, Calbergaria was invaluable! Why would he do this?"

traits.locale_text: « Tanakia est la meilleure spécialiste en espionnage du seigneur inquisiteur ! Partout où Xavier se refusait de faire une démonstration de force en public, Calbergaria lui était extrêmement utile ! Pourquoi ferait-il une chose pareille ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Tanakia ist die beste Spionagespezialistin des Großinquisitors! Immer wenn Xavier keine öffentliche Machtdemonstration wollte, war Calbergaria unverzichtbar. Warum sollte er so etwas tun?"
languages.original_text: "Tanakia is the Lord Inquisitor's top espionage specialist! Wherever Xavier chose to refrain from making a public show of strength, Calbergaria was invaluable! Why would he do this?"

traits.locale_text: "Tanakia ist die beste Spionagespezialistin des Großinquisitors! Immer wenn Xavier keine öffentliche Machtdemonstration wollte, war Calbergaria unverzichtbar. Warum sollte er so etwas tun?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Tanakia, Lord Engizisyoncu'nun en büyük casusluk uzmanıdır! Xavier ne zaman güç gösterisinde bulunmak istese Calbergaria'nın niteliklerinden faydalanırdı! Bunu neden yapsın ki?"
languages.original_text: "Tanakia is the Lord Inquisitor's top espionage specialist! Wherever Xavier chose to refrain from making a public show of strength, Calbergaria was invaluable! Why would he do this?"

traits.locale_text: "Tanakia, Lord Engizisyoncu'nun en üst düzey casusluk uzmanıdır! Xavier ne zaman bir güç gösterisinde bulunmak istese Calbergaria'nın niteliklerinden faydalanırdı! Bunu neden yapsın ki?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
